Topic.Title: Beware of using very short sound samples!

Posts.EditableText:
I discovered that if you play a very short sound sample (under 1 second)  in your game as part of a series of scripts, at best,...it won't play.
At worst, it crashes/freezes your game!
If you have a text, then a very short sound (with a wait to finish sound selected option), then a text, then a longer sound. GAME FREEZES.
